SUPERADMIN can access every user, user can only see itself

get.description: SUPERADMIN can see every tenant, current user will only see those which he's connected to

get.description: Users can only see the tenants they're connected to

patch.description: Only ADMINs can update a tenant

delete.description: Only organizations with no donations nor registrations can be deleted.
